articles.description: Captain Harry Maguire fired Manchester United into the semi-finals of the FA Cup with a winner deep into extra-time against ten-man Norwich City at Carrow Road on Saturday.

articles.title: Saints knock off reigning Premiers in milestone Maddie's Match - St Kilda FC
articles.description: A significant day for St Kilda has turned into a sensational one after knocking off the reigning Premiers by 26 points in the fifth Maddie’s Match on Saturday afternoon.
